title: Behind the scenes at Biden’s inauguration & the virtual DNC: Ricky Kirschner & Stephanie Cutter
description: Democratic political consultant Stephanie Cutter and Emmy-winning TV producer Ricky Kirshner joined up together in the midst of the pandemic to produce “Celebrating America,” the first virtual Democratic National Convention last August … and then again for “America United,” Joe Biden’s inauguration.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Democratic political consultant Stephanie Cutter and Emmy-winning TV producer Ricky Kirshner joined up together in the midst of the pandemic to produce “Celebrating America,” the first virtual Democratic National Convention last August … and then again for “America United,” Joe Biden’s inauguration.
itunes:title: Behind the scenes at Biden’s inauguration & the virtual DNC: Ricky Kirschner & Stephanie Cutter
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: How the pandemic might have changed political conventions forever.
itunes:subtitle: How the pandemic might have changed political conventions forever.
